channel.title: Webclient - Starting Up
channel.description:
So I saw Project Amaze's thread with the webclient ready client, and I used ric's tutorial on webclient. I'm using this client http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498024.0.html I went on ric's tutorial and I followed from the jarmaking part and followed the instructions. I uploaded cache.zip on my website fozul.com/play/cache.zip and I tried running the HTML ---------------- I gave a 2nd attempt with a different webclient ready source and client cache at http://www.fozul.com/play2 I get rsapplet error :S however when I run client.jar by itself it works just fine :/ im using this code in the html [code] Your Title here

NOTE: Note here
Note here [/code] I'm at the brick wall, all I get is Starting up...

item.title: Webclient - Starting Up
item.dc:creator: @Decronix Decronix
item.description:
@Decronix wrote:

Did you upload the client.class to?

item.title: Webclient - Starting Up
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

So I saw Project Amaze’s thread with the webclient ready client, and I used ric’s tutorial on webclient.

I’m using this client http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498024.0.html

I went on ric’s tutorial and I followed from the jarmaking part and followed the instructions.

I uploaded cache.zip on my website fozul.com/play/cache.zip

and I tried running the HTML

I gave a 2nd attempt with a different webclient ready source and client cache

at http://www.fozul.com/play2

I get rsapplet error :S however when I run client.jar by itself it works just fine

im using this code in the html

[code]

Your Title here

NOTE:

Note here

Note here

[/code]

I’m at the brick wall, all I get is Starting up…

Read full topic
